OrgName.entry: READERS PROJECT - SHEFFIELD TEACHING HOSPITALS NHS FOUNDATION TRUST

Desc.entry: Holds weekly workshops in the Hallamshire and Northern General Hospitals, providing patients with an opportunity to interact with each other, share experiences and talk about topics unrelated to hospital and/or illness. The project uses the art of reading to stimulate and invigorate patients, providing a normalising experience to escape the stressful and invasive environment. Welcomes volunteer involvement.
